features.name: Migrate from npm to pnpm
features.description: Migrate the project's package manager from npm to pnpm for faster installs, better disk space efficiency, and stricter dependency management. This includes updating all documentation and CI/CD configurations.

features.name: StreamFilter Request/Response Capture with UI
features.description: Use Firefox's StreamFilter API to capture HTTP requests and responses matching URL patterns defined in a configuration. This feature will intercept both regular requests and XHR calls, store captured data in memory, and provide a UI to view the captured information.
verification: StreamFilter API integrated in background script
URL pattern configuration system implemented
Regular HTTP requests captured successfully
XHR requests captured successfully
Request headers, body, and metadata stored
Response headers, body, and status stored
In-memory storage working correctly
UI displays list of captured requests
UI shows detailed request/response information
Pattern matching filters work correctly
TypeScript compilation passes with no errors
Extension builds successfully for Firefox
Extension loads and functions in Firefox without errors
